%%
%% The abstract is a short summary of the work to be presented in the
%% article.
\begin{abstract}
  In this paper we compare Vegas, BBR, Cubic and NewReno on LEO networks.

  % contributions:
  % 1. provide a framework to measure the impact of satelite movement and handovers
  % 2. provide explanations to why each protocol behave the way it does
  % 3. provide packet level results on different protocols  

\end{abstract}

\subsection{Orbital Planes}

Figure \ref{tab:comparison}.

  \caption{Comparison of congestion control algorithms on different orbital planes}

\subsection{NewReno}

\end{acks}
